thread.title: Overnight Bomb Attack in Turkey

author: Assignment Editor
title: Overnight Bomb Attack in Turkey
text:
Overnight Bomb Attack in Turkey   
Sep 16, 2015 eTN   
Three Turkish police officers were killed by Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK) militants overnight in a bomb attack. The event happened while the officers were travelling inside an armored vehicle along a highway in southeast Turkey. 
Not only the three officers were murdered but another officer was also wounded in the attack. 
In 1984, the PKK, designated a terrorist group by Turkey, the United States and European Union, started its separatist movement and an estimate of at least 40,000 people have fallen victims to the conflict.
